name: Peri Peri Porto
address: 848 Powell St, Vancouver, BC V6A 1H8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Whole Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated in our secret blend of spices and flamed grilled in your choice of spice level from our world of flavors. Choose from original, mild, lemon & herb, hot & very hot!

hasMenuItem.name: Aladdin Ultimate Pack
hasMenuItem.description: Indulge in fiery flavors with our chicken peri peri: succulent grilled chicken marinated in a tantalizing blend of spicy peri peri sauce. Served with zesty sides for a taste bud-tingling experience. 2 whole chicken + 3 large sides includes (feeds 6 people).

hasMenuItem.name: Half Chicken + 1 Regular Side + Chicken Skewers
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated in our secret blend of spices and flamed grilled in your choice of spice level from our world of flavors. Choose from original, mild, lemon & herb, hot & very hot!

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Sandwich and 1 Regular Side
hasMenuItem.description: Flame-grilled boneless chicken breast topped with peri peri mayo, red onions, crisp lettuce, & slice of tomato on a brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Jarritos
hasMenuItem.description: Traditional Mexican sodas available in lime, mandarin, Mexican cola, guava, and mango flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, moist chocolate cake with a creamy, melted chocolate center.
